means.word_mean: 困惑的,慌乱的,惊呆了的

entry.def: If you are confused, you do not know exactly what is happening or what to do.

example.ex: A survey showed people were confused about what they should eat to stay healthy...
example.tran: 一项调查表明，人们对该吃什么才能保持健康这个问题感到困惑。

example.ex: Things were happening too quickly and Brian was confused.
example.tran: 事情发生得太快，把布赖恩给弄糊涂了。

entry.def: Something that is confused does not have any order or pattern and is difficult to understand.

example.ex: The situation remains confused as both sides claim success.
example.tran: 由于双方均宣称获胜，形势依然不明朗。

example.ex: ...a modern society in which values have become increasingly confused.
example.tran: 价值观变得越来越混乱的现代社会

means.word_mean: 1. perplexed by many conflicting situations or statements; filled with bewilderment;

sentences.sentence: "she felt lost on the first day of school"
"a confused dream about the end of the world"

means.word_mean: 3. having lost your bearings; confused as to time or place or personal identity;

sentences.sentence: "I frequently find myself disoriented when I come up out of the subway"

means.word_mean: 4. thrown into a state of disarray or confusion;

sentences.sentence: "a confused mass of papers on the desk"

means.word_mean: 5. mentally confused; unable to think with clarity or act intelligently;

sentences.sentence: "the flood of questions left her bewildered and confused"

Sentence.sentence: This crazy bus schedule has got me completely confused.

While Gail Obcamp, an American artist was giving a speech on the art of Japanese brush painting to an audience that included visitors from Japan, she was confused to see that many of her Japanese listeners have their eyes closed
Educators may fear that children hearing two languages will become permanently confused and thus their language development will be delayed ;this concern is not documented in the literature.
He found that many of his subjects were confused by the infinite options their money presented them with
They can become confused by seeing many photographs or similar faces.

sentences.en: All your changes of plan have made me totally confused.
sentences.cn: 你把计划改来改去, 我都糊涂了。
